changeSet.author: Aleksander.shukurov@gmail.com
changeSet.comment: fill in the table "company_statuses" with test data
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO company_statuses (company_status, inserted_at_utc, comment) VALUES ('REGISTERED'::company_status_enum, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', 'Company status - registered'), ('ACTIVE'::company_status_enum, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', 'Company status - active'), ('FREEZED'::company_status_enum, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', 'Company status - freezed'), ('ELIMINATED'::company_status_enum, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', 'Company status - eliminated')
